# Valtech Frontend Recruitment Challenge

![Logo](data:image/png;base64,)

A simple SPA project to consume NewsApi api, and display the information
in a responsive web page.

Project created with the Vite tool:

![Logo](data:image/jpeg;base64,)

https://vitejs.dev/

## Environment Variables

To run this project, you will need to add the following environment variables to your .env file

`VITE_CLIENT_KEY`

You will need to generate your API Key from newsapi.org and paste it into `.env` file

## Run Locally

Clone the project

```bash
  git clone https://github.com/birarr/valtech-challenge
```

Go to the project directory

```bash
  cd stormIdeasChallenge
```

Install dependencies

```bash
  npm install
```

Start the server

```bash
  npm run dev
```

## Tech Stack

**Client:** React, React-Query, Typescript, TailwindCSS

\*\*API: NewsApi

## What still needs to be done

- Implement the input search

- Better separate the components in smaller ones, especially the News.tsx

- Implement a theme switch to dark mode (Optional)

- Implement a subcribe function to get the user email, so we could send nes on his/her email. (Optional)

- Implement a warning modal when the user api reach the daily usage, to inform that the user. will need to wait at leas 12h. (Optional)

- Implement the sign in section, to only allow the user to see the news, after be logged. (Optional)
